[Harvard graduate]1-harvard graduate .

Bottom line , [I]0-sally ’m eclectic . A confusing mix of inappropriate jokes and heartfelt sentiment , [you]415-you can dig and dig , and [you]415-you ’ll still be miles from the bottom of [me]0-sally .

At least , that had always been the case until [Cassie Phillips]2373-cassie .

[She]2373-cassie ’s crazy and needy and borderline inappropriate at all times .

[Fasten]87-fasten that seat belt tight , [ladies]419-ladies and [gentleman]420-gentleman .

This is [us]421-us .
